question: What is the latest version of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn?
answer: The latest version of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn is Version 2.2, which was released on 20.12.2023.

question: What new features were added in Version 2.2 of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn?
answer: In Version 2.2 of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn, a model pose library option and an acne option were added. Additionally, bug fixes and optimizations were implemented.

question: What new options were added in Version 2.1 of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn?
answer: In Version 2.1 of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn, options for body type, wrinkles, beard, and tanned skin were added. A new workflow with 2 groups of ControlNet nodes for pose and hand control was also introduced, along with examples.

question: What major updates were included in Version 2.0 of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn?
answer: Version 2.0 of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn added some new options, an upscaler in the workflow, ControlNet in the workflow for pose control, example files in PNG format, as well as bug fixes and optimizations.

question: What changes were made in Version 1.5 of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn?
answer: In Version 1.5 of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn, the nationality list was updated to include 193 options. New options for face shape, facial expression, facial asymmetry, and dimples were added. Bug fixes and optimizations were also implemented.

question: When was the first release of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn?
answer: The first release of comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn was on 13.12.2023.

question: Were there any updates made to comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn on 15.12.2023?
answer: Yes, on 15.12.2023, bug fixes and optimizations were made to comfyui-portrait-master-zh-cn.
